description: Choose Your Own Adventure with one of our supported installs and follow along with the foundation best-practice examples of creating a website using the latest version of eZ Platform. In this workshop, you will learn practical ninja skills to go from zero to hero by watching a live install and build of an eZ Platform site. This inside look at how eZ Systems uses their own product internally is presented by eZ's Technical Product Manager and covers the most current workflows and steps supported and recommended by eZ.
